recipesName.name: Kung Pao Chicken
ingredients: 1 can (15 ounces) kidney beans, drained and rinsed
recipesName.cookingMethod:
1. In a large pot, cook ground beef over medium-high heat until browned. Drain excess fat.
2. Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
3. Add kidney beans and diced tomatoes. Stir well.
4. Bring to a simmer and cook for 30 minutes.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipesName.name: Egg Drop Soup
recipesName.cookingMethod:
1. Cut the avocados in half, remove the pits, and scoop out the flesh into a bowl.
2. Mash the avocados with a fork or potato masher.
3. Add the onion, jalapeño pepper, cilantro, and lime juice. Mix well.
4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
